title: grapevine hubspot sync outdated - answers are dated, records not updating
content:
[2025-11-19T16:17:00.000Z] barrett: Hi I am noticing that some of grapevine's answers are dated - and it's requesting that I update records on my side that have been updated for a number of days. Is there a way to force update grapevine's hubspot sync?
[2025-11-19T16:22:00.000Z] Kumail Jaffer: @Chandler can you and connectors squad look into this?
[2025-11-19T16:23:00.000Z] Kumail Jaffer: @barrett the expectation is that hubspot sync is never more than a couple of hours out of date (at worst). this is likely a bug on our side.
[2025-11-19T18:42:00.000Z] Chandler: yep we'll take a look!
